snippet.title: How to make a pumpkin pie from scratch [Infographic]
snippet.description: The star ingredient in any pumpkin pie is the pumpkin pie puree. But why trust a can when real, fresh puree is so easy to make? In addition to making a better-tasting pie, you’ll also know exactly what you’re feeding your family. Check out this illustrated recipe from

snippet.title: Pumpkin Week: Pumpkin chili
snippet.description: It feels like fall outside, and I think I'm actually ready for the crisp weather. I've been posting quite a few summery recipes recently, with my garden getting in it's last words , but the cool, sunny days have made it clear it's time to switch gears.

snippet.title: Fresh pumpkin pies taste better

snippet.title: Fresh pumpkin puree, homemade pumpkin pie spice and more

snippet.title: Adding traditional twists to the Thanksgiving meal [Infographic]
snippet.description: A new survey released by Pillsbury reveals how food trends are shaping today’s Thanksgiving table and how more than half of Americans would embrace adding new foods or new preparations to their meal this year. While some are starting to offer alternatives to turkey, more are

snippet.title: Eat pie on Pi Day
snippet.description: Do you like pi? No, not pie; pi. You know, 3.141592... (that's about as far as I can get). What's not to like about it? It helps you calculate circumference and area of a circle, there's a special button for it on your calculator and it goes on
